product_name: Green Guru Must-Stash Top Tube Bag
long_description: Sourced from used materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Must-Stash Top Tube Bag offers a place for your keys, phone and wallet while you ride. Green Guru Must-Stash Top Tube Bag is constructed of upcycled bicycle inner tubes and upcycled banners for highly water-resistant performance. When mounted to the bike it is easily accessible, and when you're off the bike, it can be taken off and converted into a hip pack or clutch purse. Please note that because this item is made of upcycled materials, each one is unique and specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Sourced from used materials and stitched together with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Must-Stash Top Tube Bag offers a place for your keys, phone and wallet while you ride.
